## each() function

Iterates through the given `obj` and applies the given function. if `obj` is not ArrayLike then the function is executed directly on `obj`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function each(obj: any, fn: Function): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | any |  |
|  fn | Function |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
